Pray <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> we are persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, desiring <S%G2309><s%> to live <S%G390><s%> honorably <S%G2573><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> you the more exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may be restored <S%G600><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the sooner <S%G5032><s%>.

Amen <S%G281><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, bear <S%G430><s%> with the word <S%G3056><s%> of exhortation <S%G2532><s%>, for <S%G1063><s%> I have written <S%G1989><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> few words <S%G1024><s%>.
